title: STUCK AT THE SCREEN WITH THE BIG L LOGO
body:
After the launch button problem, another decides to come up
When I run League Client
It brings me to the screen with the L logo
And it wouldn't load 
Someone help plz?
{{item:3151}} {{item:3151}}

replies.body:
Its all OK now
Thanks anyways

It sounds like your connection to our servers is fairly poor, which would cause the issue you're seeing. Before we start taking a look at your route to the server, I'd like you to work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with Leauge.

Let me know if those steps garnered any noticeable changes.
